page.title: 04Military Establishments
page.content: There are{two}military establishments in the area. The old{RAF radar station}along Ripley road was built during the Second World War and is now used as a Signals Training Centre. {Sopley Camp}is situated along Derritt Lane and was originally built to house troops during the Second World War. In recent times it has been used as a reception centre for the "Boat People" from Vietnam and is now used by the House Hold Cavalry to give the horses a holiday. The camp has lots of roads between the huts, barns and shelters. A large gate shuts off the Camp.
